text: Waited 40 minutes for pickup. Staff seemed overwhelmed and uninterested in helping customers.
Quick service and super friendly at checkout! The food was amazing and fresh.
Food was decent but order notes were completely ignored. Disappointing experience.
Mobile app kept crashing during order process. Very frustrating and lost my patience.
Clean store with decent prices. Parking was a bit tight but overall good experience.
Delivery was 30 minutes late and two items were missing from my order.
Excellent customer service! The staff went above and beyond to accommodate our large group.
Average experience overall. Food was okay but nothing special for the price point.
Great atmosphere and good food quality. Would definitely recommend for casual dining.
Terrible customer service. Waited over an hour for cold food. Will never return.
Amazing flavors and generous portions. The staff was incredibly attentive and friendly.
Food was cold when it arrived and the delivery driver was rude. Very disappointing.
Beautiful restaurant with excellent decor. Food was good but a bit overpriced.
Average food quality. Service was slow but the staff was polite when they finally came.
Best meal I've had in months! Every dish was perfectly cooked and seasoned.
